attributes.action: Remove all alcohol content from alcohol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If people genrally like alcohol for the taste and nothing else then the alcohol content in it will not matter.
But it seems more and more that people like to get drunk and abusive. The only way the government can really put its foot down on such behaviour is to remove all traces of alcohol content from the booze sold on the shelf today. People could drink as much as they like and they wound not get drunk.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
